name: Marc S
text: The best pizza place in Isla Vista. No questions. Cheap, unlimited ingredients for less than $10, quality ingredients, friendly staff, deals happening quite often... Just perfect.

name: Duncan P
text:
Very friendly manager and employees.

I got the garlic knots and got home and realized they didn't give me the sauce. …More

name: Leah Kwok
text: I've been to pizza chains like this before, fresh fired, thin crust. In comparison, I found the crust to be a bit too thin/a little too weak to hold stand up to the ingredients, I didn't load this one up too too much. Good quality ingredients, good flavor, nice variety of drink options.

name: Alexis Felix _
text: The food is always good after or before class and I never get sick of it and the staff are always nice and the service is great

name: Duncan Richmond
text: Fast, tasty, filling food and really good drink options make this place pretty good, but the best part is the people. I went in once and they were out of one of my favorite things, so someone went way into the back of the store to get more for me even though I was content to have something else. 10/10 service.

name: Kieran Apgar
text: Wednesday night. 8pm. Just got off work.  Biked super speed to Blaze, grabbed my pizza, and dashed to my dorm. Literally ran huffing puffing up the stairs. As soon as I opened my Blaze it was like unveiling treasure. The smell and sight …More

name: Gustavo Calderon
text: This review is of the Blaze Franchise. Blaze Pizza is the new "Subway" of Pizza. Subway was very popular when it was new in the 80's until consumers realized its was made with cheap, unhealthy  ingredients and was not the sandwich they once …More

name: kitti
text: First time there. The Staff was amazing, the food was amazing, the service was amazing. They were packed and we still didn't have a long wait.  The food was fresh,  hot,  delicious

text: Such a cute pizza place right in the downtown area of the university. Definitely has a college vibe. Very clean & friendly staff w outdoor seating in front w heaters & umbrellas. There's a parking lot about a block up to park in, but there …More

name: Trevor Anderson
text: Pretty good location. Staff is pretty good about keeping wait times down, it takes about the same amount of time to get your pizza each time. Pretty chill atmosphere.

name: Tamok Mok
text: Nice place with great tasting and affordable pizza. Staff is super nice and they have a great choice of toppings. I would recommend this location.

name: Olivia Hernández Harnish
text: Really good pizzas with as many toppings that you want! Affordable meal and great place to eat and hang out with your friends. Totally recommend.

text: I am Italian and know good pizza, especially when it's free. Go after hours to the back door and ask the closing staff for leftovers.

text: What’s the point of having an online delivery service and a phone number to the restaurant if you can’t even contact the store? To check on an order I paid for.

name: Rachy Ford
text: Blaze is one of the few places where you can get your pizza really personalized. They have pretty fresh ingredients so if you have some time on your hands and don't have to rush off anywhere I would say Blaze is a great quality pizza place. …More

name: Ben Payne
text: The build your own pizza can be absolutely fantastic and all the regular pizza options are tasty. The cheese selection is better than you would expect. The blood orange soda on tap is delightful. All in all a good experience if you're looking for a personal pizza

name: Jared Flores
text: Blaze. What can I say? You can hardly go wrong at one of these places -- it's part of a much larger chain and has a commitment to quality. There's a lot of pizza spots in the area, like Woodstock's or Domino's, but Blaze manages to maintain …More

text: Like Subway for pizza. Very fun. Crowded, so you know it is popular. Two kinds of tomato sauce and I tried both. The spicy one was too ranchero-spicy. I like a good zesty Italian sauce but this tasted like Mexican food spice to me. Now I know, and will definitely go back

text: This is a very unique pizza joint.  They make the pizza right in front of you.  It's a fun experience.  $5.85 for a one-topping pizza or $7.95 for any toppings.  The pizzas are good, and they have smore pies for dessert.
